title: Jon Ward of ICON
description: Jonathan Ward of Icon joins us once again; this time in the newly built Chevy Thrifmaster Derelict.  We of course talk about what is cooking at Icon these days but Jonathan also fills us in on his current time at the Art Center College of Design and the finer details in Koenigsegg and Pagani carbon work.  In addition Matt reviews the Superformance GT40 the Luftgekühlt Porsche event is discussed and Jonathan promotes the Cars and Casino night for the Go Campaign.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
